title: Compass
summary: Building the shared coordination infrastructure — charter, archetypes, registry, and web viewer — for the Henkaku Center ecosystem.
project_goals: Define shared charter and governance framework
Design registry archetypes for 7 entry types
Build web viewer for coordination documents

title: Registry Platform Development
summary: Designing and building the platform where registry entries are submitted, browsed, and maintained.

requires.description: Archetypes and charter must be defined before platform can implement them

title: Sustainable Robotics Construction
summary: Developing voxel-based, sustainable robotic construction methods in collaboration with MIT.
